description: This file provides middleware functions for request validation in an Express.js application. It defines two exported functions, validateBody and validateQuery, which generate middleware to validate and sanitize req.body and req.query respectively, using provided validator functions.

methods.name: validateBody(validator)
methods.description: Creates an Express middleware that validates req.body against a validator function, responding with a 400 error if validation fails, or proceeding to next middleware if successful.

methods.name: validateQuery(validator)
methods.description: Creates an Express middleware to validate req.query against a validator function, responding with a 400 error if validation fails, or calling next if successful.
